review: This is a great little gadget with many movie titles, games and  apps. The only problem some of the preloaded games and apps will never be used.  I was disappointed that dailymotion and vimeo app had very limited search capabilities. I could not download  some of the many popular video search browsers but for the price I guess it is what should be expected. This is definitely better than the Google Chrome Stick which I took back it just wasn't worth it. I enjoy using this Fire Stick when there is nothing on tv it helps ease the boredom.
author: Rita Farias

review: Very easy to use and a great bonus for Prime users
author: Chris Flanary

review: I purchased the Fire TV stick to replace a Roku streaming stick, and I found that Fire Tv stick is WAY more responsive, FASTER, and it has a load more storage.  Also Voice search using your smart phone is nifty.  This, I have to say, is the best and most cost effective way to turn your dumb tv into a SmartTV!
author: Robert S.

review: Very pleased with the Fire TV Stick.  Has the apps I wanted (thank you for Sling TV!), stable platform, and an intuitive remote.  Feels like the finished product it is.  Would like to see some support for a web-browser to reach the streaming sites that currently don't have apps (Crunchyroll), and support on the Home screen for non-Amazon 3rd party apps, but I'll be patient and let the developers do their thing.
author: Craig Zank
